title: OOM error in DevConsoleOidcNoDiscoverySmokeTest
body:
### Describe the bug

I've noticed the following error in

https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/actions/runs/5574319191/jobs/10183572640?pr=34784

```
 Error:  Errors: 
Error:    DevConsoleOidcNoDiscoverySmokeTest.testOidcProviderTemplate Â» Runtime io.quarkus.builder.BuildException: Build failure: Build failed due to errors
Error: ]: Build step io.quarkus.arc.deployment.ArcProcessor#buildCompatibleExtensions threw an exception: java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space
	at java.base/java.io.InputStream.readNBytes(InputStream.java:405)
	at java.base/java.io.InputStream.readAllBytes(InputStream.java:346)
```

### Expected behavior

_No response_

_No response_
